description: The versatile RENEGADE™ AFIRE Chino Pants offer the toughness and durability of hiking pants disguised as a refined pair of chinos. Soft yet extremely durable, KÜHLs exclusive softshell fabric is quick dry with abrasion and water-resistance. Superior stretch and our articulated patterning provide superior freedom of motion and the ideal fit. Maximum (UPF 50+) sun protection.
name: Kuhl Renegade Afire Chino, 32" Inseam - Mens
